name: Foundation-First Testing
description: Test design pattern that prioritizes testing foundational components before higher-level integration, ensuring solid building blocks for the application
when_to_use:
Layered architecture testing
Unit testing foundation
Integration testing strategy
Test pyramid implementation
benefits:
Early bug detection
Improved code quality
Faster feedback loop
Reduced integration issues
drawbacks:

Requires discipline
May seem counterintuitive
Additional planning needed

Microservices architecture
Complex business logic
Multi-layer applications
